00006 #ifndef KL_PPM_IMAGE_IO_H
00007 #define KL_PPM_IMAGE_IO_H
00008 
00009 #include "kl_image_buffer.h"
00010 #include "kl_image_io.h"
00011 
00012 bool query_ppm(const char* filename,unsigned int &width,unsigned int &height,unsigned int &bands);
00013 bool read_ppm(const char* filename,unsigned int width,unsigned int height,unsigned int bands, unsigned char * inputbuf);
00014 
00015 void write_ppm(const char* filename, klRasterBufferPointer klrbp);
00016 
00017 void write_ppm_single_band (const char* filename,klRasterBufferPointer klrbp);
00018 
00019 class klPPMSinkFunctor : public klImageFileSink
00020  {
00021  public :
00022      klPPMSinkFunctor(const char* fileName, klRasterBufferPointer buffer)
00023          : klImageFileSink(fileName, buffer)
00024      {
00025      }
00026 
00027      void operator()(void)
00028      {
00029          unsigned int numBands = _rbp->numBands() ;
00030          if(numBands ==3)
00031          {
00032              write_ppm(_filename, _rbp);
00033          }
00034          else if(numBands ==1)
00035          {
00036 
00037              write_ppm_single_band(_filename, _rbp);
00038          }
00039          else
00040          {
00041              throw " Unsupported number of bands in klPPMSinkFunctor.  One and three band buffers are supported.";
00042          }
00043 
00044      }
00045 
00046  };
00047 
00048 class klPPMSourceFunctor : public klImageFileSource
00049 {
00050 
00051 public :
00052 
00053     klPPMSourceFunctor(const char* fileName) //: klImageFileSource(fileName)
00054     {
00055         _filename = fileName;
00056     }
00057 
00058     bool queryImage()
00059     {
00060         unsigned int width=0;
00061         unsigned int height=0;
00062         unsigned int bands=0;
00063 
00064         bool ans = query_ppm (getFileName(), width, height, bands);
00065         
00066         if(ans ==1)
00067         {
00068             setImageParameters( width, height,bands, 8);
00069         }
00070 
00071         return ans;
00072     }
00073 
00074     klRasterBufferPointer operator()(void)
00075     {       
00076         if( queryImage() )
00077         {
00078             klRasterBufferPointer dst = new klPackedHeapRasterBuffer<unsigned char>(getWidth(),getHeight(), getBands() );
00079 
00080             read_ppm (getFileName(), getWidth(),getHeight(), getBands() , dst->buffer());
00081             return dst;
00082         }
00083         else
00084             return NULL;
00085     }
00086 
00087 };
